title: Creeping Dread
story: The very air of the castle thickens with unseen horrors, stirring primal fears in the hearts of the heroes.
effect: During this Night phase, at the start of each hero's turn, they must test their Sanity (roll D6). If the result is 1-3, they lose 1 Sanity. If a hero's Sanity drops to 0 this way, they are momentarily paralyzed and immediately lose 1 action this turn.
